description: GENVOZ is a schema and rule-set that turns real-world voice transcripts from Thai SMEs and similar speakers into structured 4-layer economic meaning frames. It runs on top of the Reflex801 / VoiceGold field OS.

layers.name: Narrative Slice
layers.purpose: Capture what is happening in plain terms per short segment.

layers.name: Emotion & Stress
layers.purpose: Describe emotional tone and stress level.

layers.name: Economic Context
layers.purpose: Make economic structure visible from the story.

layers.name: Forward Signal
layers.purpose: Offer cautious 1–3 month outlook and pivot points.

example_query_TH: ช่วยวิเคราะห์ transcript เสียงของแม่ค้าตลาดสดนี้ตามโครงสร้าง GENVOZ (L1–L4) และให้ผลลัพธ์ในรูปแบบ JSON ตามสคีมาที่กำหนด
example_query_EN: Analyze this SME voice transcript using the GENVOZ schema (L1–L4) and return JSON according to the provided segment and layer definitions.
